Control Name: Control physical access for onsite personnel to the sensitive areas as follows:\n- Access must be authorized and based on individual job function.\n- Access is revoked immediately upon termination, and all physical access mechanisms, such as keys, access cards, etc., are returned or disabled.

control_attributes.Control: Control physical access for onsite personnel to the sensitive areas as follows:\n- Access must be authorized and based on individual job function.\n- Access is revoked immediately upon termination, and all physical access mechanisms, such as keys, access cards, etc., are returned or disabled.
control_attributes.Requirement: 9.3. Restrict physical access to cardholder data
